data.name: Ammo Capacity
data.flavor: Additional storage compartments to hold extra thermal clips.
data.mechanic: Increase your thermal clip capacity by 2

data.name: Weapon Stabilizers
data.flavor: Incorporate micro-gyros linked with your hard suit's internal targeting aids.
data.mechanic: You gain a +2 bonus to ranged weapon attacks

data.name: VI Aiming
data.flavor: A built-in VI aim enhancement targets enemies' vulnerabilities.
data.mechanic: You gain a +2 damage bonus to each ranged weapon damage roll

data.name: Microservos
data.flavor: Microservos coordinate your melee strikes.
data.mechanic: You gain a +2 damage bonus to each melee damage roll

data.name: Shield Capacity
data.flavor: Micro-harmonic oscillators to reduce stress on the kinetic barriers ensuring suit integrity when faced with oncoming projectiles.
data.mechanic: Increase your shield points by 10.

data.name: Amplifier Plates
data.flavor: Includes an internal micro-control system to maximize resources.
data.mechanic: Reduce tech point costs by 1, to a minimum of 1. This cannot be used to cast tech powers beyond your max tech point limit.

data.name: Medi-gel
data.flavor: Microprocessors in this interface monitor vital functions and release small localized doses of medi-gel to accelerate the healing process. Manually timed heavy doses of medi-gel can be released in response to major trauma.
data.mechanic: You may automatically pass a Wisdom (Medicine) check when you stabilize an ally. You can use once per long rest.

data.name: Bladed Wristguards
data.flavor: Reinforce armor with razor-sharp blades that deal damage to melee attackers.
data.mechanic: When you are hit with a melee attack, deal 1d6 piercing damage back at the attacker.
Resistance to force

data.name: Battle Telemetry
data.flavor: Battle telemetry systems increase the efficiency of your biotic amplifiers and omni-tool.
data.mechanic: Regain 5 tech points or 1 spell slot on a short rest.

data.name: Armor Plating
data.flavor: Hardened ceramic plates can be applied to body armor suits, increasing their effectiveness.
data.mechanic: Gain +1 AC

data.name: Ablative Coating
data.flavor: Ablative coating is designed to chip away when impacted, redirecting the energy of incoming projectiles away from the body.
data.mechanic: Gain +2 AC

data.name: Energized Plating
data.flavor: A prototype upgrade designed specifically for heavy combat use, it provides maximum protection for the user
data.mechanic: Gain +3 AC

data.name: Asymmetric Defense Layer
data.flavor: Offering increased protection where it's needed most, Rosenkov Materials' proprietary coating process increases stopping power of standard ceramic armor.
data.mechanic: Gain +2 AC and +20 HP

data.name: Ammo Capacity
data.flavor: Additional storage compartments to hold extra thermal clips.
data.mechanic: Increase your thermal clip capacity by 6

data.name: Barrier
data.flavor: Eezo oscillator provides a biotic-like barrier.
data.mechanic: The armor contains a mass effect barrier with 5 barrier ticks. You cannot use these additional barrier ticks for biotic spells, they are only for damage reduction. The barrier ticks recharge after a long rest.

data.name: Adrenaline Regulator
data.flavor: Biofeedback system regulating wearer's adrenaline surges.
data.mechanic: You gain a +2 damage bonus to each melee damage roll

data.name: Toxic Resistance
data.flavor: Specially-sealed body armor and biotoxin blood filters provide increased protection against radiation, gases, and a host of other toxins.
data.mechanic: Resistance to acid and poison damage. You have advantage on saving throws that would cause you to be poisoned.

data.name: Recharge Capacitor
data.flavor: Micro wells store part of the energy directed at the armor and use it to jump start the kinetic barrier recharge cycle.
data.mechanic: You shields recharge every turn, despite taking damage.

data.name: Shield Battery
data.flavor: An increased shield battery for your kinetic barrier.
data.mechanic: Increase your shield points by 10.

data.name: Shield Modulator
data.flavor: A series of ultra-efficient storage cells augment the existing power in the operation of the wearer's kinetic barrier.
data.mechanic: Increase your shield points by 20.

data.name: Shield Interface
data.flavor: Advanced VI systems monitor incoming enemy fire to redirect energy to vulnerable points, maximizing the effectiveness of a suit's kinetic barrier shields.
data.mechanic: Increase your shield points by 30.

data.name: Ceramic Weave
data.flavor: Elite personal protection equipment includes a series of interlocking ceramic plates covered in a proprietary tungsten alloy weave for maximum stopping power.
data.mechanic: Increase your hit points by 10.

data.name: Medi-gel
data.flavor: Microprocessors in this interface monitor vital functions and release small localized doses of medi-gel to accelerate the healing process. Manually timed heavy doses of medi-gel can be released in response to major trauma.
data.mechanic: You may automatically pass a Wisdom (Medicine) check when you stabilize an ally. Additionally, if you fall below 0 hit points and you have medi-gel charges left, you immediately become stabilized. You can use this 3 times per long rest.

data.name: Thermal Armor
data.flavor: Heat regulators keep your armor warm in the coldest environments.
data.mechanic: You are immune to being frozen.

data.name: Environmental Regulators
data.flavor: Temperature controls use liquid nitrogen and plasma to keep your suit at a constant temperature.
data.mechanic: Resistance to fire and cold damage.

data.name: Hardened Weave
data.flavor: A complex filament network of element zero microcores combined with advanced firewall technology provides protection against both biotic and tech attacks.
data.mechanic: Resistance to cold, fire, force, lightning, and necrotic damage types.

data.name: Battle Telemetry
data.flavor: Battle telemetry systems increase the efficiency of your biotic amplifiers and omni-tool.
data.mechanic: Regain 10 tech points or 2 spell slots on a short rest.

data.name: Auxiliary Shield Emitters
data.flavor: Micro-capacitors that release energy to speed up shield regeneration.
data.mechanic: Increase your shield regen by 1 die type (max d12).

data.name: Auxiliary Shield Emitters
data.flavor: Micro-capacitors that release energy to speed up shield regeneration.
data.mechanic: Increase your shield regen by 1 die type (max d12).

data.name: Umbra AI
data.flavor: By detecting the focal point of the wearer's eyes and enhancing the image at that location, the visor helps direct a biotic power or a shot from an omni-tool exactly where the wearer is looking.
data.mechanic: You gain a +2 bonus to ranged biotic or tech attacks.

data.name: Focus Modulator
data.flavor: Your headwear filters out distracting movement and sounds from sources other than your target.
data.mechanic: You gain a +2 bonus to ranged attacks.

data.name: Voice Modulator
data.flavor: Includes an advanced audio processing package that allows unprecedented clarity and resonance for spoken communication.
data.mechanic: Gain +2 to Persuasion and Intimidation checks

data.name: Recharge Capacitor
data.flavor: Micro wells store part of the energy directed at the armor and use it to jump start the kinetic barrier recharge cycle.
data.mechanic: You shields recharge every turn, despite taking damage.

data.name: Sentry System
data.flavor: A software application that optimizes an armor suit's microframe computer. When the Sentry system is running, more power can be devoted to shield management.
data.mechanic: Increase your shield points by 10.

data.name: Archon AI
data.flavor: An efficiency algorithm to balance processing power for biotic amps and omni-tools. A heads-up display and voice command software allows users to micromanage the systems, reducing the cooldown period between energy expenditures.
data.mechanic: Gain one half of your tech points and spell slots (rounded down) on a short rest.
Resistance to necrotic

data.name: Archon AI
data.flavor: An efficiency algorithm to balance processing power for biotic amps and omni-tools. A heads-up display and voice command software allows users to micromanage the systems, reducing the cooldown period between energy expenditures.
data.mechanic: Gain one half of your tech points and spell slots (rounded down) on a short rest.

data.name: Ammo Capacity
data.flavor: Additional storage compartments to hold extra thermal clips.
data.mechanic: Increase your thermal clip capacity by 4

data.name: Microservos
data.flavor: Microservos coordinate your melee strikes.
data.mechanic: You gain a +2 damage bonus to each melee damage roll

data.name: "Cleats"
data.flavor: Copper microfilaments in your boots ground you and abate electrical shock.
data.mechanic: Resistance to lightning.

data.name: Stimulator Conduits
data.flavor: Incorporates a series of beryllium and tungsten braces and micro-servos to support and enhance the natural movements of the wearer for short periods of time.
data.mechanic: Increase your speed by 6m.

data.name: Life Support Webbing
data.flavor: A net of micro-stimulants and medi-gel in order to increase the chances of survival for aid workers and military personnel working in a hostile environment.
data.mechanic: Increase your hit points by 10.

data.name: Ordinance Packs
data.flavor: Co-developed by the Rahael Group and Beckmann Financial to solve the issue of munitions storage for Heavy Weapon class engagement tools.
data.mechanic: Increase the charges of your heavy weapons by 2.

data.name: Medi-gel
data.flavor: Microprocessors in this interface monitor vital functions and release small localized doses of medi-gel to accelerate the healing process. Manually timed heavy doses of medi-gel can be released in response to major trauma.
data.mechanic: You may automatically pass a Wisdom (Medicine) check when you stabilize an ally. You can use this 2 times per long rest.

data.name: Mag Latches
data.flavor: Powerful magnets keep you grounded.
data.mechanic: If you are standing on a metal surface, you are immune to being lifted. Otherwise, if you would make a saving throw against being lifted, you have advantage.

data.name: Auxiliary Shield Emitters
data.flavor: Micro-capacitors that release energy to speed up shield regeneration.
data.mechanic: Increase your shield regen by 1 die type (max d12)
Increase your grenade capacity by 3
